metadata.name: Aid Type (category)
metadata.description: This codelist exists to group the Aid Type codelist into categories. It is not used as a codelist in its own right.

data.name: Budget support
data.description: For contributions under this category, the donor relinquishes the exclusive control of its funds by sharing the responsibility with the recipient.

data.name: Core contributions and pooled programmes and funds
data.description: For contributions under this category, the donor relinquishes the exclusive control of its funds by sharing the responsibility with other stakeholders (other donors, NGOs, multilateral institutions, Public Private Partnerships or PSI vehicles). The category covers both core contributions (B01 and B02), pooled contributions with a specific earmarking (B03 and B04) and PSI intra-governmental transfers (B05).

data.name: Project-type interventions
data.description: N.B. Within this category, members able to do so are requested to report the aggregate amount used for financing donor experts/consultants on Table DAC11. Where the activity consists solely of experts’ costs, report under category D.

data.name: Experts and other technical assistance
data.description: This category covers the provision, outside projects as described in category C, of know-how in the form of personnel, training and research.

data.name: Scholarships and student costs in donor countries
Other in-donor expenditures
data.description: Groups a number of contributions that do not give rise to a cross-border flow.
